mapper.select: select * from source order by source_no desc
mapper.insert:
select tag_seq.nextval from dual
insert into tag (tag_no, instrument, genre, scape, detail,fx) values (#{tagNo}, #{instrument}, #{genre}, #{scape}, #{detail}, #{fx})

select source_seq.nextval from dual
insert into source (source_no, source_name, bpm, key, source_price, tag_no, pack_no, user_no,source_time) values (#{sourceNo} , #{sourceName}, #{bpm} , #{key}, 30, #{tagNo} , 1 , 1,#{sourceTime})
insert into sourceimginfo (source_img_originname , source_img_storedname , source_no) values (#{sourceImgOriginname}, #{sourceImgStoredname}, #{sourceNo})

select sourcefileinfo_seq.nextval from dual
insert into sourcefileinfo (upload_no, file_originname, file_storedname,file_size ,source_no) values (#{uploadNo}, #{fileOriginname}, #{fileStoredname} , #{fileSize} ,#{sourceNo} )

select pack_seq.nextval from dual
insert into pack (pack_no, pack_name , pack_content , tag_no) values (#{packNo} , #{packName} , #{packContent} , #{tagNo})
insert into packimginfo (pack_no, pack_img_originname, pack_img_storedname) values (#{packNo}, #{packImgOriginname}, #{packImgStoredname} )

select source_seq.nextval from dual
insert into source (source_no, source_price, tag_no, pack_no, user_no) values (#{sourceNo} ,30, #{tagNo} , #{packNo} , 1)
